timeline.message:
Adding back a validation of incorrect response header

this.

                        String msg = String.format(Locale.ROOT, "Invalid request content type: Accept=[%s], Content-Type=[%s], format=[%s]",
          
      
    
    
  

Generally QL code uses square brackets to enclose values; this makes white space easier to spot and formatting to read.
Also, I guess we want to point out that the request is ill-formatted?
But otherwise LGTM, thanks.
